news.title: Bitcoin Firms Team Up to Launch â€˜Clean Energy' Mining Venture
news.text: DMG Solutions and Argo Blockchain are teaming up to launch a Bitcoin mining pool to run on hydroelectric resources.

news.title: Market Roundup: Friday Bounce Sees Bitcoin Recover To $53,500 While Altcoins Rally
news.text: Following a tumultuous week for the crypto market, things finally appeared to be turning around on Friday.

news.title: KiwiSaver fund invests in Bitcoin as institutional interest swells
news.text: KiwiSaver Growth Strategy, a retirement fund run by New Zealand Wealth Funds Management, has invested in Bitcoin (BTC).

news.title: BTC/USD Peaks Above 54225 on Rebound: Sally Ho's Technical Analysis 27 March 2021 BTC
news.text: Bitcoin (BTC/USD) gained ground early in the Asian session as the pair appreciated to the 54096.27 level.

news.title: Price analysis 3/26: BTC, ETH, BNB, ADA, DOT, XRP, UNI, THETA, LTC, LINK
news.text: Bitcoin price bounced off the 50-day moving average but the real test is near $57,500 where the bears are likely to push back.

news.title: Is General Motors Planning to Accept Bitcoin Payments?
news.text: Automotive giant General Motors is monitoring Bitcoin's potential, but it is not yet clear whether the firm actually plans to accept the cryptocurrency.

news.title: Microsoft Rolls Out Bitcoin-Powered Identity Platform
news.text: Microsoft is launching a platform that can authenticate identities using the Bitcoin blockchain.

news.title: Bitcoin at 'Inflection Point' as Fiat Debasement Rises: Soros Fund Management CIO
news.text: Investment banker Dawn Fitzpatrick said the private investment fund is putting money into cryptocurrency infrastructure.

news.title: Bitcoin Rejected At $60K While Global Markets Start To Splutter: The Weekly Crypto Recap
news.text: Bears took control this week, sending Bitcoin's price from around $60K down to $50K.

news.title: Ark Investment's Cathie Wood Cautions Investors On Buying Tesla With Bitcoin (BTC)
news.text: Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced that the company has started accepting Bitcoin payments against the purchase of any Tesla model.
